title: Arthur: Arthur's first sleepover
brief_description: Arthur is a young aardvark. His animated stories are based on the books “Arthur Adventure” by Marc Brown. Three episodes of “Arthur” featuring the aardvark and his family and his friends are on this video. His adventures are that of an ordinary eight year old. “Arthur’s first sleepover” has Arthur and his friends camping in the backyard, “Arthur’s New Years Eve” is when Arthur finds out what all the fuss is about and in “Arthur’s Family Vacation” the whole family take an exciting trip together.
